announcements.title: Dorm Meeting
announcements.author: RA Emily
announcements.content: There will be a mandatory dorm meeting in the lounge at 7 PM.

announcements.title: Maintenance Notice
announcements.author: Facilities
announcements.content: Water supply will be temporarily shut off tomorrow from 10 AM to 12 PM.

announcements.title: Social Event: Game Night
announcements.author: Student Activities
announcements.content: Join us for a fun-filled game night in the student center! Prizes will be awarded.

announcements.title: Library Closure
announcements.author: Library Staff
announcements.content: The library will be closed for inventory on Friday, February 28th. Normal hours will resume on Saturday.

announcements.title: Career Fair
announcements.author: Career Services
announcements.content: Don't miss the annual career fair! Meet with recruiters from top companies.

announcements.title: Tutoring Available
announcements.author: Academic Support
announcements.content: Free tutoring is available in math, science, and writing. Sign up online.
